summary: Add Some funny named Armours in your game.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=4]Mandu by Neo[/size][/color][/b]

Author : Meister aka Neovinci

=============================================================================

[youtube]8jIaf0JQtU8[/youtube] [youtube]eF0aDCDdu94[/youtube] 
by Brodual (youtube-BDMods) / by Chayification (youtube-Chayification)

[youtube]ZXkn_0YVrnc[/youtube] 
by hodilton (youyube-hoditon)



Add Some funny named Armours in your game.

\"Mandu\" means Koreanized Dumplings, originated from China.

Then? Why?

Most of you will know a famous game character \"Chun Li\" in the \"Street Fighter\" series.

She has a very unique and cute hair style. and most of Korean call it as \"Mandu hair\".

because her two ball shaped hair style looks like some Korean \"Mandu\".

This female helmet inspired from Chun Li\'s hair style, so naturally I named it \"Mandu\"

Male Armours are relatively closer to original skyrim Armour style as you can see.



-Heavy and Light type Armours for Male and Female characters.

-The Poach containing these armours located in the Embershard Mine.

-You can\'t craft these Armours at any forge.

-But You can temper these with Glass(for light armour) or Ebony(for heavy armour) Perks.

-Female Armours are based on UNPB/UNP but CBBE users can use it. 




There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

especially when you mix with other armours.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)

Have an exciting journey in Skyrim.



=============================================================================

[b][color=yellow]Location :[/color][/b] There\'s a Pouch, in the Embershard Mine, near by Riverwood.(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] DIMONIZED UNP female body (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709) 
                                                     or Calientes Female Body (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666)

[b][color=yellow]Important Requirement[/color][/b] : Latest version of Skyrim (at least over 1.9)

=============================================================================

[b][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/b]

thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body

calypse for UNP Blessed body(UNPB)

Caliente for nice CBBE Female Body

Blender developers

Halofarm for nice poses in sample images

Members of \'NAVER ElderScrolls7\' cafe for useful tips and tutorials

Members of \'Naver Escroll\' cafe

TESNEXUS Staff membership and many Nexus friends 



=======================================================================

[b]This Mod is NEXUSMODS.COM exclusive.
You can do whatever with it for personal usage. 
It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.[/b]
author: Meister aka Neovinci
